c74object.name: ibufinfo~
c74object.digest: Get info about an ibuffer~ (or buffer~)
c74object.description: Returns length, sample rate and number of channels for ibuffer~ or buffer~ objects. Does not output if the named ibuffer~ / buffer~ does not exist.

objarg.name: (i)buffer-name
objarg.description: Set the name of the ibuffer~ / buffer~ to output info on

method.name: bang
method.description:
Output the length, sample rate and number of channels each out their own outlet.
Also causes a bang out each outlet.

method.name: set
method.description:
Set the name of the ibuffer~ / buffer~ to output information about.
Setting also causes an immediate output.
The set message should be formatted as:
set / buffer name

entry.name: Outputs
entry.description:
First outlet outputs the size of the ibuffer~ / buffer~ as a float in milliseconds.
Second outlet outputs the sample rate of the ibuffer~ / buffer~ as an int.
Third outlet outputs the number of channels in the ibuffer~ / buffer~ as an int.
